tileentity.line: var Iron = getSlot(nbt['items'], 9, 'index'); return Iron['Count']
var NanoHopper = getSlot(nbt['items'], 10, 'index'); return name(NanoHopper)
return nbt['powerLevel']+' / 2000000 LP'
if(nbt['allowAutoDestroy'] == 0){return translate("hud.msg.logisticspipes.off")} else{return translate("hud.msg.logisticspipes.on")}
return nbt['internalStorage']+' / 10000000 RF'
return nbt['internalStorage']+' / 40000000 EU'
var disk = getSlot(nbt['diskInvitems'], 1, 'Count'); if(disk['Count'] == 1){return translate("gui.fluidsupplier.Yes")}
return nbt['satelliteid']
var output = getSlot(nbt['items'], 9, 'index'); return name(output)
return nbt['priority']
return nbt['resistance']
return nbt['amount']
var authorize=nbt['upgradeManager']['SecurityInventory_items'][0]['index']; if(authorize == 0){return translate("gui.firewall.Firewall")+"√"}
